v7.0 (2025-09-22)
- Newly added support for Windows ARM64
- Enhanced download for faster speed
- Optimized VPN connection to intelligently connect to the best server
- Newly added game boosting function in Servers for Gaming
- Optimized Split Tunneling to link all related apps with the current configuration
- Kill Switch now supports stopping the specified appâ€™s Internet traffic when VPN drops unexpectedly
- Enhanced the support for email clients
- Optimized the structure of the server list to be more intuitive
- One account now supports logging on up to 8 devices
- More intuitive UI, more user-friendly design
- Fixed all known bugs
